title: Alia Bhatt & Ranbir Kapoor To Fly To Manali In November For 15-Day Shoot For Brahmastra
text:
Alia Bhatt & Ranbir Kapoor To Fly To Manali In November For 15-Day Shoot For Brahmastra

Alia Bhatt & Ranbir Kapoor To Fly To Manali In November For 15-Day Shoot For Brahmastra

Dharma productions and Ayan Mukerji's Brahmastra is one of the most eagerly awaited projects. Starring Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor, the fantasy drama film, which was initially scheduled to release around Christmas this year, will now hit the big screens in summer 2020.

Twitter

The team of the film, including lead actors Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt, are all set to travel to Manali to resume work on the next schedule of the film.

The 15-day Manali leg of the schedule was planned for earlier this year but given Alia's health at the time, the shoot was postponed. The film has been shot in numerous locations around the world. A source close to the project speaking to Mumbai Mirror revealed that the Manali schedule is important for the team, and the film.

The source was quoted as saying,"Ranbir, Alia and the entire cast will fly to Manali in November for a 15-day shoot. Every location carries Shiva’s (RK’s character) story forward. Manali, too, plays an important role in the screenplay."

The source further added that the Manali schedule will consist of the parts that will progress Shiva’s origin and self-discovery. Brahmastra would be the first installment of a trilogy.

Directed by Ayan Mukerji, the film will also star Amitabh Bachchan, Nagarjuna and Mouni Roy among others.
